name: File Sharing Premium Bot
description: Telegram File Sharing Premium Bot Bot

CHANNEL_ID.description: Make a channel (database channel), then make the bot as admin in channel, and it's id

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL.description: id of the channel or group, if you want enable force sub feature else put 0

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL2.description: id of the channel or group, if you want enable force sub feature else put 0

START_MESSAGE.description: Optional: start message of bot, use HTML parsemode format
START_MESSAGE.value: ʜᴇʟʟᴏ {first} ɪ ᴀᴍ ᴀ ꜰɪʟᴇ ꜱᴛᴏʀᴇʀ ʙᴏᴛ ᴏꜰ ɪᴀꜱ ᴍᴏᴠɪᴇꜱ & ꜱᴇʀɪᴇꜱ, ɪ ꜱᴛᴏʀᴇ ꜰɪʟᴇꜱ ɪɴꜱɪᴅᴇ ᴍᴇ ᴀɴᴅ ʏᴏᴜ ᴄᴀɴ ɢᴇᴛ ᴛʜᴇᴍ ʙʏ ꜱᴏʟᴠɪɴɢ ꜱʜᴏʀᴛᴇɴᴇʀ ꜰʀᴏᴍ ᴏᴜʀ ᴄʜᴀɴɴᴇʟ! » @IAS_MOVIESANDSERIES

FORCE_SUB_MESSAGE.description: Optional: Force Sub message of bot, use HTML parsemode format
FORCE_SUB_MESSAGE.value:
𝐒𝐨𝐫𝐫𝐲 {first} 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐡𝐚𝐯𝐞 𝐭𝐨 𝐣𝐨𝐢𝐧 𝐦𝐲 𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐥𝐬 𝐟𝐢𝐫𝐬𝐭 𝐭𝐨 𝐚𝐜𝐜𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐟𝐢𝐥𝐞𝐬...

 𝐒𝐨 𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐞 𝐣𝐨𝐢𝐧 𝐦𝐲 𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐥𝐬 𝐟𝐢𝐫𝐬𝐭 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐜𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐤 𝐨𝐧 “𝐍𝐨𝐰 𝐂𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐤 𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐞” 𝐛𝐮𝐭𝐭𝐨𝐧...!

ADMINS.description: A space separated list of user_ids of Admins, they can only create links
